item.title: By: Martin G
item.dc:creator: Martin G
item.description:
Why, if I may ask, were you looking for 'Chav'? And why not opt for a more ethnically closer-to-home term like 'ned' or 'schemie'?
Please tell me this isn't in the wake of the Jade Goody International Crisis ( "Chav Starts WWIII!")...
item.content:encoded:
Why, if I may ask, were you looking for ‘Chav’? And why not opt for a more ethnically closer-to-home term like ‘ned’ or ‘schemie’?

Please tell me this isn’t in the wake of the Jade Goody International Crisis ( “Chav Starts WWIII!”)…
